userOffsetActivities.description: Purchase locally grown and seasonal produce to reduce food miles and support regional agriculture.
Contribute to environmental organizations to support their vital work in conservation and sustainability.
Opt for buses, trains, or trams to reduce your carbon footprint and ease traffic congestion.

userOffsetActivities.offsetActivity: Reduce water usage (shorter showers, fix leaks)
userOffsetActivities.description: Conserve water by taking shorter showers and fixing leaks, helping to protect this precious resource.
